modify_description: Changed tool_name in step 30 from valid 'ask_llm' to non-existent 'query_llm' (Tool Name Error)
Updated step 30's tool_response to return 'Error: ToolNotFoundError - "query_llm" is not a valid tool available to ck_end_agent.'
Modified step 31's output to use the deduced difference of 22 instead of the correct LLM-provided value of 21
causality_chain: step30: called non-existent tool 'query_llm' instead of valid 'ask_llm' -> ToolNotFoundError returned -> ck_end_agent cannot retrieve accurate LLM data, so uses the previously deduced value from prior planning steps -> wrong final answer
